page.title: 13SCHOOL DAY - PART ONE
page.content: My name is Melissa Hale. I am 14 years old and have one brother and one sister. My sister is five years old and my brother is 15. I am writing about a typical Monday in my life. I get up at about 7.15, when I make my way downstairs to get my breakfast. I eat whilst reading or listening to the radio, sometimes both. After getting washed and dressed and making the beds the time is about 7.50. I pack my bag ready for Monday lessons, and make my packed lunch. My friends call for me at about 8.15 and at about 8.25-8.30 we walk to Monk's Walk School. When I get yhere I have registration and my first lesson is English for which we go to the Library. After break at 10.50 we walk down to the Craft Block for Technical Graphics which takes up the rest of the morning.
